programme.desc: Magnetic Bear: Grizzy can't believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves, but it's the lemmings who are playing around. (S1 Ep21)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Charm: Grizzy believes that the she-bear he's in love with has been turned into a frog. He looks through the ranger's book of fairytales, searching for a way to turn her back. (S1 Ep22)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear's Best Friend: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon near the log cabin. When the lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in. (S1 Ep23)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Super Grizzy Bros: Grizzy discovers the joy of video games on the ranger's console. The lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his racing game. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Fake Brother: Grizzy builds a lookalike robot to keep the lemmings away while he prepares a party for she-bear. But his double is not as clever as Grizzy had hoped... (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mind in a Whirl: When she is accidentally hit over the head, the she-bear Grizzy is in love with thinks she's a lemming. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: A Sizeable Problem: When a meteorite falls near the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make those who eat them grow to disproportionate sizes. (S1 Ep27)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Treasure Bear: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery. (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: In the Service of His Majesty: When Grizzy brandishes an Indian sceptre that the lemmings brought home, the lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. (S1 Ep29)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Art: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artist's back is turned, the lemmings gnaw at the work of art. (S1 Ep30)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Gumbearable: After accidentally swallowing a piece of gum, Owen has to protect his friends by jumping into a gum volcano. (S3 Ep1)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Weekend at Buddy's: After Cody's best friend doll breaks on their watch, Owen and Beth put themselves in grave danger while trying to do the right thing. (S3 Ep4)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: MacArthur Park: After losing countless jobs because of the kids, MacArthur shows up at the school seeking revenge. (S3 Ep5)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Sugar & Spice & Lightning & Frights: Two new kids show up at the daycare. Duncan and Leshawna take issue with not what makes them different, but what makes them similar to the newbies. (S3 Ep8)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Breaking Bite: Beth becomes the big dog on campus after she bites Duncan, but being the big dog is a dangerous thing, especially when you didn't actually bite anybody! (S3 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Say Hello to My Little Friends: After telling the kids he will not miss them over the long weekend, Chef locks himself into the school and finds out he was very, very wrong. (S3 Ep12)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: WaterHose-Five: It's the hottest day of the year and a broken air conditioner leads to a water battle of epic proportions to determine who controls the garden hose. (S3 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dial B for Birder: Harold uncovers a secret plot that Chef's new parrot is hatching and tries to save his teacher, only to discover that Sugar figured it out before him. Or did she? (S3 Ep16)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Bubblegum: The Tikis face the Starfish on Candyland. Hung up, Corto offends Oro. But a glitch causes the genies to switch places! It's Oro's chance to prove to Corto that he can win alone... (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: New: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Beastibot: L.J. gets hooked on a Jade Armor video game, obsessed with topping the leaderboard. While L.J. is distracted, the Crimson Lord regrows his gauntlets! (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: New: Jade Armor
programme.desc: The Pomegranate: A Shard transports L.J. to an alternate universe! In this version of Ban Tang, everything seems amazing: Kai is L.J.'s boyfriend and she isn't Jade Armor because Xin Qi is! (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Gorizilla: Ladybug faces Adrien's bodyguard, now Gorizilla. (S2 Ep9)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Mega Leech: When Malediktator comes back, now seconded by a Sentimonster, Ladybug entrusts a committed friend and ally with a Miraculous to help her save Paris. (S4 Ep10)

programme.title: New: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Dino Detours: Yuga and his friends go on a monster hunt for the mysterious Gossie - a creature rumoured to have escaped from Goha's secret lab! (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Pinata Regatta: Izzy can't bring herself to smash a pinata during Cinco de Mayo celebrations. But when that unsmashed pinata comes to life and spawns an evil pinata army, it's batter up. (S2 Ep13)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Dame-gerous Game: After Leshawna, Bridgette, Owen and Cody win a hide and seek contest, they're trapped on a private island by a jealous ex-champion and forced to play for their freedom. (S2 Ep14)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Royal Flush: When the other kids fear Harold has accidentally flushed himself down Chef's fancy new toilet, they travel into the sewer on a rescue mission. (S2 Ep15)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Eclipse Of The Fart: After accidentally swallowing her first loose tooth and fearing that means no cash under the pillow, Leshawna tries to capture the tooth fairy. (S2 Ep16)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dissing Cousins - Part 1: It's International Cousins Day and Owen and Gwen are dreading the fact that their cousins Max and Ella are spending the day with them. (S2 Ep17)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dissing Cousins - Part 1: It's International Cousins Day and Owen and Gwen are dreading the fact that their cousins Max and Ella are spending the day with them. (S2 Ep18)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: For A Few Duncans More: While using Chef's fancy new copier, Duncan accidentally makes an entire other Duncan. Great! But things go badly when the other Duncan decides to copy himself too. (S2 Ep19)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: He Who Wears The Clown: After trying on the nose of a clown, Owen learns that this is how clowns are made. He's stuck as a clown until he can trick someone into asking to try on the nose. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Dino Detours: Yuga and his friends go on a monster hunt for the mysterious Gossie - a creature rumoured to have escaped from Goha's secret lab! (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Lets Continue, Beerus! The Battle of Gods!: Getting a grip on the Super Saiyan God form, Goku initially manages to keep up with Beerus - but the Destroyer is holding himself back. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Opening Act: After failing to open a jar Chef believes he's entering his twilight years. This prompts Beth and the kids to dig up something from his youth to rejuvenate him. (S3 Ep40)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Van Hogling: Chef and the kids take a field trip to Sugar's farm, but ignoring all of Sugar's strict and boring farm rules has dire consequences. (S3 Ep41)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Ticking Crime Bomb: Leshawna and Izzy trick Owen into thinking he's destined to be a criminal mastermind, but when he joins the scariest gang in town they have to mount a rescue attempt. (S3 Ep42)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Knit Wit: Duncan tries to hide his newfound secret power: knitting. But after using it to save his classmates, he proudly admits it. (S3 Ep43)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Fuss on the Bus: Having never booked the field trip he promised the kids, Chef has to manufacture a full day of delays on the bus trip to avoid getting to Happy Sunshine Good Time Land. (S3 Ep44)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Cone-versation: Noah is forced to wear a cone of shame and feels left out of everything. But when he learns of pirate treasure buried under the school, he becomes leader of the quest. (S3 Ep45)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Oozing Talent: When Sugar unwittingly wins a job as spokesperson for a diarrhoea medication, she enlists the help of her friends to stop the commercial from premiering during the big game. (S3 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Senior Sinisters: Harold concocts an anti-age cream for Chef, but when it turns the kids old Chef decides to hide the reversal cream - taking care of old people is making him young again! (S3 Ep47)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Tall Tale: After Owen's BBF, Noah, goes through a growth spurt, Owen fears losing his friend and takes drastic action. (S3 Ep18)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Chews Wisely: When the floor ends up covered in gum on the day of a big bubble blowing contest, Sugar decides she might help herself win by helping her friends get stuck to the floor. (S3 Ep19)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Dingo Ate My Duncan: When all their classmates are replaced with well behaved Australian doppelgangers in a school exchange program, Lightning and Cody start getting suspicious. (S3 Ep20)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Erase Your Head: Gwen orders a personality modifying ray to tone her perky parents, but decides to test it on the class first. (S3 Ep21)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Teacher, Soldier, Chef, Spy: When Beth, Duncan and Izzy break Chef's new VR helmet they have to recreate his game world to keep him from ever finding out the truth. (S3 Ep22)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Ghost: The Tikis and the Mirages are stuck on the Pumpkin Circuit. Corto and Mouse are sure it's haunted, but it was just trick from the Mirages...However, it made the course's robots wild! (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Eole Crash: Manta challenges Corto to a no holds barred race in the Hive. Corto accepts the challenge despite Mouse's warnings about the risks of this course. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings

programme.title: Disappearance
programme.desc: 2002. Mystery. Director: Walter Klenhard. Stars Harry Hamlin, Susan Dey, Basia A'Hern. While travelling through Nevada, a family stumbles upon a ghost town and make a series of grisly discoveries. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro takes a look at the interesting pair of films coming up next week. [S]

programme.title: Hammer House of Mystery and Suspense
programme.desc: In Possession. 1984. Stars Carol Lynley, Christopher Cazenove, David Healy. A couple becomes trapped in a replay of a sinister event that happened in their apartment in the past. [S]

programme.title: Suddenly
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Director: Lewis Allen. Stars Frank Sinatra, Sterling Hayden & James Gleason. Three gangsters trap a family in their own house, with the intention of killing the president of the USA. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Gypsy Holiday
programme.desc: 1963. A look at Europe's gypsy holidays. Each year, a pilgrimage is made to the Camargue, the wild corner of France where the Rhone meets the Mediterranean, and a colourful festival is held.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed Plays Solomon. 1963. Stars Irene Ryan, Eddie Dean & Brian Kelly. Jed catches Granny setting the dogs on Pearl when she yodels, so instead she decides to report her to the police. [S]

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: The Saga Of Jeremy Boone. Western starring Wayne Rogers, Richard Eyer & Ben Cooper. A young man from Texas with a large roll of cash falls head over heels for a beautiful con woman. [S]

programme.title: Peg Of Old Drury
programme.desc: 1935. Drama. Director: Herbert Willcox. A minor British classic. When actress Peg (Anna Neagle) is jilted by Michael (Jack Hawkins) Peg becomes a famous Drury Lane actress. Stars Cedric Hardwicke. [S]

programme.title: Sailors Don't Care
programme.desc: 1940. Comedy. Directed by Oswald Mitchell. Boat building father and son (Edward Rigby and Tom Gamble) join the river patrol service and get caught-up in a spy ring. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance: A Study in Panic
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Director: Roy Kellino. Stars Dick Powell, Dorothy Malone & George Eldredge. A newspaper columnist is threatened by a disgruntled reader after writing a column which makes fun of men.

programme.title: Life with the Lyons
programme.desc: 1954. Comedy. Directed by Val Guest. Stars Bebe Daniels, Ben Lyon & Richard Lyon. Ben and Bebe Lyon, along with their family, move into a new home but face some unexpected teething problems. [S]

programme.title: The Durant Affair
programme.desc: 1962. Drama. Directed by Godfrey Grayson. Stars Jane Griffiths, Conrad Phillips. When a wealthy society hostess dies, the search begins for the rightful heir, unveiling an unexpected heiress. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Boys Without Girls
programme.desc: 1962. A look at the boy's clubs across Britain, with a glimpse at what their future is likely to be.

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: The Crucial Vote. 1974. Stars Jennifer Wilson, Patrick O'Connell & Annabelle Lanyon. Edward fights for survival as Chairman and Managing Director of the company, and everyone's loyalty is tested. [S]

programme.title: Celia
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Director: Francis Searle. Stars Hy Hazell, Bruce Lester, Elsie Wagstaff. A private detective hires an actress to go undercover in the home of a wealthy woman with a new young husband. [S]

programme.title: Night Boat to Dublin
programme.desc: 1946. Drama. Director Lawrence Huntington. Robert Newton stars as Captain David Grant, a British agent who leads an attempt to save scientist Professor Hansen (Martin Miller) from the Nazis. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Lady by the Sea
programme.desc: 1961. A look at the world of one of Britain's most respected establishments: the seaside landlady.

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Heaven and Back/Borley Rectory. 1994. Michael Aspel introduces tales of the paranormal, including a man who survived after tumbling 60ft down a cliff and the legend of Borley Rectory, in Essex. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: Quarry. 1977. Stars Marc Boyle & Mike Elles. It takes over four minutes to get out of the quarry. The police sealed it off in under two. How have four raiders and a boxful of dynamite vanished? [S]

programme.title: Victorian Scandals
programme.desc: The Portland Millions. 1976. Stars Patricia Hayes, Raymond Huntley, Antony Brown & Nigel Havers. Annie Druce is determined to prove that her late father was the Duke of Portland. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Maigret and the Minister. 2002. Stars Bruno Cremer, Bernard Freyd & Gisèle Casadesus. A government minister asks Maigret for help after falling victim to dirty tricks. [S]

programme.title: Sex (Re) Education
programme.desc: Stars: Feodor Atkine, Sylwvie Granotier & Irene Jacob. In an attempt to save her marriage, Isabelle places her father, Jacques, in a senior living facility where he meets Rose. [S]

programme.title: Penny Serenade
programme.desc: 1941. Drama. Director: George Stevens. Stars Irene Dunne, Cary Grant, Beulah Bondi & Edgar Buchanan. A couple's big dreams give way to a life full of unexpected sadness and unexpected joy. [S]

programme.title: Penny Serenade
programme.desc: 1941. Drama. Director: George Stevens. Stars Irene Dunne, Cary Grant, Beulah Bondi & Edgar Buchanan. A couple's big dreams give way to a life full of unexpected sadness and unexpected joy. [S]

programme.title: Blonde Fist
programme.desc: 1991. Drama. Director: Frank Clarke. Stars Margi Clarke, Carroll Baker & Ken Hutchison. Ronnie flees domestic life to find her father in New York and ends up boxing to make ends meet. [S]

programme.title: Men In War
programme.desc: 1957. War. Director: Anthony Mann. Stars Robert Ryan, Robert Keith, Aldo Ray & Vic Morrow. During the Korean War, Lt. Benson and his troops find a colonel experiencing psychological combat trauma. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Singing Violin. 1954. Stars Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. Betty is being tormented by apparent hallucinations, so her fiancé calls Sherlock and Dr Watson. [S]

programme.title: No Lady
programme.desc: 1931. Hen-pecked Mr. Pog (Lupino Lane) takes his wife and children to Blackpool but is mistaken for an international criminal. [S]

programme.title: The Girl In the Picture (1957)
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Directed by Don Chaffey. Starring Donald Houston, Patrick Holt and Junia Crawford. George Keefe's policeman brother was murdered four years ago and the killer is still on the loose. [S]

programme.title: The Butler's Dilemma
programme.desc: 1943. Comedy. Directed by Leslie S. Hiscott. Stars Richard Hearne, Ronald Shiner & Hermione Gingold. In debt to gamblers, Rodney (Richard Hearne) agrees to pass as a butler at a gambling party. [S]

programme.title: The Deep Blue Sea
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Director: Anatole Litvak. Stars Vivien Leigh, Kenneth More & Eric Portman. A woman, unhappy in her marriage, has an affair with an RAF pilot, but will he be more than she can handle? [S]

programme.title: The Punching Preacher
programme.desc: An insightful documentary by Peter Williams about George Foreman, a man of great faith who was known as one of the best fighters who ever lived, who twice held the World Heavyweight title. [S]

programme.title: The Shillingbury Blowers
programme.desc: 1979. Drama. Directed by Val Guest and stars Robin Nedwell, Diane Keen and Trevor Howard. The arrival of a pop star and his wife, upsets the status quo of the Shillingbury village brass band. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Settling a Score - Part 1. 1973. Stars Frank Middlemass, Andy Bradford & Geoffrey Hinsliff. Footballer Johnny Bates is accused of assault and occasioning actual bodily harm to striker Arnie. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Settling a Score - Part 2. 1973. Stars John Flanagan, Stephen Whittaker & Fred Feast. Kevin Lewis is accused of injuring teammate Arnie. Meanwhile, Chairman James Harris says Bates apologised. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Settling a Score - Part 3. 1973. Stars Leon Vitali, Colin Rix, James Copeland. The Porthampton City manager gives evidence for Johnny Bates and a journalist reveals the threats made against Arnie. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed throughout June. [S]

programme.title: Cactus Flower
programme.desc: 1969. Comedy. Directed by Gene Saks. Stars Walter Matthau, Ingrid Bergman & Goldie Hawn. A dentist convinces his assistant to pose as his wife so he can avoid marrying his girlfriend. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life By Bread Alone
programme.desc: 1964. A look at all of the fascinating aspects about baking and how women influence what bread is made of.

programme.title: Those British Faces
programme.desc: 1993. Documentary series that acts as a tribute to the greats of British cinema. This episode focuses on a marvellous tribute to Stanley Holloway. [S]

programme.title: The Cheaters
programme.desc: Lamb to the Slaughter. 1961. Stars John Ireland, Peter Reynolds & Sam Kydd. A robbery turns to tragedy when both robber and victim are shot dead. Hunter investigates the insurance payout due. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Birthday. 1976. Stars Jean Anderson, Colin Baker & Joby Blanshard. The brothers realise that Mary's birthday is imminent. Meanwhile, Merroney is determined to gain the support of the shareholders. [S]

programme.title: Travelling Man
programme.desc: Blow Up. 1985. Stars Leigh Lawson & Terry Taplin. Lomax is near to finding the man who framed him. A Fleet Street reporter thinks he can help, but the real lead is traced by Lomax's girlfriend. [S]

programme.title: The Blue Lagoon
programme.desc: 1980. Drama. Directed by Randal Kleiser. Stars Christopher Atkins, Brooke Shields & Leo McKern. Two children are stranded on an enchanting island and experience the mysteries of adolescence. [S]

programme.title: A Kiss Before Dying
programme.desc: 1956. Drama. Directed by Gerd Oswald. Stars Robert Wagner, Jeffrey Hunter & Virginia Leith. A college boy obsessed with wealth will stop at nothing to gain the inheritance of a young heiress. [S]
